description: Your team gains a new developer. You are responsible for bringing them up to speed. While not everyone is a natural teacher, everyone can be taught basic teaching fundamentals. We will take a look at principles anyone can use to become a more effective trainer/teacher. Better teaching technique makes the training process more effective and enjoyable. Effective training reduces new developer frustration and increases job satisfaction for everyone.
